pages.text: $(li)Endermen are tallest neutral creatures that can appears at night or in places with low illumination over the Overworld, in the Nether or in the End.$(br)$(li)If you see them directly to their eyes, they will turn aggressive towards you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ender_pearl)Ender Pearls$(/l) upon death.
If an Enderman detects a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/endermite)Endermite$(/l) near it, it will not hesitate to attack this tiny creature.
